title: The Original Post
content: Sometimes you just gotta get in there and write something creative. Blog writing has never been a 'thing' for me, but I'm down to give it a try. I've read about folks making money running a blog, suggesting products, and affiliate marketing. Maybe that is the ticket for me. The recent GitHub education pack gives me a handful of free domain names and hosting for a year. I suppose I will use one of those for a blog, maybe another for a drop shipping ecommerce site? The next few months will be an interesting journey.
